title: Boderless positioning problem

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: I Would like to know how can I put it on the middle of the monitor using boderless :|

replies.body: Are you able to toggle your video settings to full screen borderless?  You should be able to click and hold the edge and move the screen if bordered, then switch back to borderless.  I hope that helps!

Your resolution may be set to a small state on borderless window.  You should have a drop menu to adjust to a higher resolution in the video options.  The only exception may be if you are running in 4K, which isn't currently supported.  If that doesn't work just hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and our tech team can help.  We'll get back to you!
my monitor is 1080p but i'm using 1600x900 boderless and i would like to put the game in the middle of the monitor but i don't know how :|
